did.unittitle: United States Bicentennial Committee, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of memoranda, subject files, publications, minutes, and related objects documenting the activities and operations of the Yale United States Bicentennial Committee.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. United States Bicentennial Committee

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 6 (YRG 6), Records of Yale committees.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: United States Bicentennial Committee, Yale University, Records (RU 714). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by type of material.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The committee was formed in 1975 to coordinate Yale University's participation in national and state activities commemorating the bicentennial of the United States of America in 1976. Robin W. Winks, a professor of history, served as chairman of the committee, which disbanded in 1977.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of memoranda, subject files, publications, minutes, and related objects documenting the activities and operations of the Yale United States Bicentennial Committee.
